name: pethive
description: PetHive is a full-stack ecommerce petshop and management tool.
author: Your Name

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate && node prisma/seed.js && cd ../client && npm run build
